titleStmt.title: Treatises of 1. The liberty of prophesying, 2. Prayer ex tempore, 3. Episcopacie : together with a sermon preached at Oxon. on the anniversary of the 5 of November / by Ier. Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

notesStmt.note: Each treatise has separate t.p., dated 1647, and pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
